Editorial: Evidence mounts against death penalty

Last modified: 2/14/2016 10:04:30 PM

‘This bill suspends the imposition of the death penalty until such time that methods exist to ensure that the death penalty cannot be imposed on an innocent person.”



That is the description of Senate Bill 463, a bipartisan piece of legislation that is the very definition of reasonable: Until the justice system is perfect, the
